price: 6. Maalintaas dadku wuxuu u soo dareeri rac rac si loo tusiyo (jazaha)acmaashooda.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yaṣduru al-nāsu ashtātan liyuraw aʿmālahum
